title: Spring in shape of circle inside magnetic field

content.prompt: A metal spring has its ends attached so that it forms a circle. It is placed in a uniform magnetic field, as shown above. Which of the following will NOT cause a current to be induced in the spring?

choices.label: Changing the magnitude of the magnetic field
Increasing the diameter of the circle by stretching the spring
Moving the spring parallel to the magnetic field
Moving the spring in and out of the magnetic field

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
